title: nothing
body: nothing happens…

title: something
body:
something happened!
new sentence

title: tv
body:
turn on the TV?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: pc
body:
work on the laptop?
[[ answer: yes|nothing]]

title: window0
body:
you look out the window
street filled with motion
people gathered here and there
you observe
unusual motion
kids play
people talking in small groups
the window looks back
you look out

title: window1
body:
quiet side of your home
not much going on out here
just a blackbird
looking for food
making a mess
silence

title: window2
body:
didn't you just look out the window?
this must be like the nth time..
not much to look at inside
hoping there is something to see outside

title: window3
body:
you look out the window
but you are not alone
so many others
peeking out to see
others
hoping to see something interesting
something to spark interest
boredom
because inside
nothing happens

title: window4
body:
just mulling over life
at the window
so much more going on out there than in here
almost like watching television
except people don't need electricity
to move their bodies
observing people
doing peopley things

title: window5
body:
back at the window
perhaps the most entertaining place at home
you wonder why you don't always gaze out like this?
so relaxing

title: window6
body:
the park in front, brimming with people
kids
dogs
people stretched out on the grass
why doesn't anybody normally just hang out like that?
friends sitting with friends
strangers talking to strangers
nobody on their phone
(because phone is useless right now)
so close, a tiny little city haven

title: window7
body:
leaves
gently swaying in the wind outside
sun shining
sun doesn't need electricity to shine
plants don't need electricity!
so green
wish my body could eat sun
green skin

title: book
body:
you open the book
the book reminds you of other times
times where time was not a matter of time
time stagnant
time infinite
time never-ending
still and perpetuous
like a book

title: typewriter
body:
writing on the typewriter
clickety clack
takes you deep into the self
demons, frustrations, joy
the complexity of life
garbled writing
word upon word
feels good

title: drawing
body:
can’t remember when you last drew
twisted figures emerge
come alive
lines
shapes
what is this stuff?
coming out of your mind..

title: bed
body:
sleep
why not?
not much else to do
and it's getting dark
everything seems so quiet 
the absence of blue light
no electric buzzes

title: couch
body:
ah, lovely couch
stare at the ceiling
a blank white canvas
the wall
also blank
comfy couch

title: plantOne
body:
you observe the stillness of the plant
you know it's moving
but you cannot perceive the movement
you try
as hard as you can
knowing you’ll never catch it moving
finding yourself in a conundrum
limitations to perceptions of life

title: plantTwo
body:
hello plant
might as well give you some water
beautiful green leaves
silent plant
moving
in stillness

title: plantThree
body:
potted funny friend
flowers sprawling around
you begin to really notice
the light, reflected
leaves stretching
towards the light
hello

title: plantFour
body:
leafy thing
shade in the summer
a silent friend
and suddenly you realize
that plants don't need electricity!
they just grab what they need
from the sun

title: meditate
body:
a rug
why not meditate?
empty your mind
nothing
zip
blip
nada
nope…
silence

title: candles
body:
you light the candle
what a stinky thing
not healthy
you light it anyway
darkness, please no
absence of light
you need to see
you want light

title: photoOne
body:
you look at the photo
miss your people
cannot get in touch with them
worry
if you ever loved, 
you worry
maybe more than you love
you worry
maybe love is worry
to miss
to be missed
to worry
to want to be together

title: photoTwo
body:
the place you go on holidays
every year
the same place
wonder if there is enough fuel in the tank
to drive all the way over there
must be chaos at the gas station
probably a lot of people trying to pump gas
lucky you don't really need the car today
do gas pumps even work without electricity??
too bad you can't walk all the way over there

title: photoThree
body:
your parent
already quite old
must be rather distraught
far away
wishing you could call
hope they are okay
just tell them you are okay
wonder if they need anything
wonder what they are up to

title: fridge
body:
you open the fridge
food warming
it will go bad
close the door quickly

title: apple
body:
you bite the apple
what a juicy, refreshing thing
red and crunchy
earthly
mundane
apple

title: water
body:
you drink a cup of water
tap water
but there is also other water
water sold as better water than other water
and other bottled water, as well
water contained by plastic
transported in plastic
weird blob-shaped plastic with water inside
or tap water
but no water comes out of the tap
people rush to buy water ottled water

title: cookies
body:
cookies!!!
yummy cookies
comfort food
strange situtation
wierd day
comfy cookies
guilty pleasure

title: game console
body:
play a videogame?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: stove
body:
cook something?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: phone
body:
call somebody?
no network...
battery level 16%

title: washing
body:
wash some clothes?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: toilet
body:
use toilet?
but the flush doesn't work..
sure you want to put up with the stinky contents?
better get a bucket?

title: sink
body:
use tap?
no water

title: lights
body:
Turn on the lights?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: stereo
body:
listen to the radio?
a battery operated radio!
it crackles into life
explains the blackout
keep it playing
all day
in touch with the outside world
things will be okay

title: clock
body:
a battery operated wall clock!
what's the time?
time
t i m e
t  i  m  e
t   i   m   e
t    i    m    e
t     i     m     e
t      i      m      e
t     i     m     e
t    i    m    e
t   i   m   e
t  i  m  e
t i m e
time
finite and never-ending
time

title: microwave
body:
warm up some food in the microwave?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: heater
body:
turn on the heater?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: leave
body:
use the elevator?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: newspaper
body:
you open yesterday's newspaper
horrible, disgusting, terrible, everywhere
blah
put it down

title: burger
body:
you take a bite of the burger
out since yesterday
not that good…
not bad either…

title: intro
body:
28th of April 2025, late morning
all electrical power is out, everywhere
while nothing happens
something else happens,
seek what happens
or…

<< set $isLastLine to true>>

title: end
body:
lights are back!!!
business as usual?
life as usual?
or did something change?
what do you want to do now?
what is your first move?

<< set $isPlayAgain to true>>

title: right
body: Empty Text

title: left
body: Empty Text

title: up
body: Empty Text

title: down
body: Empty Text
